name: Interstellar Rockhop
description:
Join Plu the space penguin on his journey across the galaxy as he hops, slides, dives, and rockets from planet to planet in this gravity-centric platformer!

Created originally as a student project as part of Ball State University's game production studio course under Dr. Gestwicki.

Credits

  • Chris Wilson (EnergizedBlast)
  • Matthew Schrag (Schram1)
  • Josh Birnbaum (joshbirnbaum)
  • Brayden Gates
  • Special thanks to Wayne Uhlenhake for the title theme music
